QuestData.Title: A Shabby New Face
QuestData.Description: A strange fellow in a pointy hat showed up this morning trying to sell some kinda special seeds. Claimed they were magic.$B$BI welcome a little competition - business is business, after all - but this gentleman had a certain... shabby look to him. Oh, and he stunk somethin' FIERCE.$B$BWould you check up on him, just to make sure he's on the level? He's over there by Jian Ironpaw, making a meal out of the samples.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Barnaby Fletcher in Halfhill Market.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Barnaby Fletcher in Halfhill Market.
